document_data.mainbody:
Composite longbows of the Hand were masterfully crafted longbows found in the Seldarines Hand citadel on the Spine of the World.
These bows were crafted by joint efforts of elves of the Seldarines Hand and dwarves of Dorns Deep.
Composite longbows of the Hand possessed a +2 enchantment.
After completion of construction of Seldarines Hand circa 900 DR, the inhabitants of the citadel lived in a close alliance with the dwarves of Dorns Deep. The troops of the elven citadel were outfitted with the best armor and weapons created by the crafters of both races. By 1281 DR, the Seldarines Hand had been ruined for centuries and came to be known as the Severed Hand, within, composite longbows of the Hand could be found within the Tower of Corellon.
